answers.answer: There is no reason you should lose your baby if you take your medical team's advice.  You will undoubtedly need to have your blood sugar measured regularly, manage your food intake carefully, and engage in physical activity.  Your physicians may also suggest medication to help keep your blood sugar under control.  As long as your blood sugar is well-managed, your chances of having a healthy baby are the same as someone who does not have pre-diabetes or diabetes.

question: If im a pre diabetic n im 5weeks will i b able to go along with my pregnancy or will i loose my baby
title: im pre diabetic
